alternate_methods:
##Registration number auctions

[DVLA Personalised Registrations](http://dvlaregistrations.direct.gov.uk/auction/ "DVLA Personalised Registrations"){:rel="external"} also auctions some exclusive registration numbers. Auctions are held about 6 times a year and reserve prices start from £250. You can see a list of the numbers coming up for auction online. You can bid in person, by phone, in writing or online.

##Buying from a private number dealer or private sale

You can also buy a personalised registration number from a dealer or from a motorist in a private sale. If you do this make sure you receive the V750 certificate of entitlement or V778 certificate of retention.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
introduction:
You can buy new registration numbers from DVLA Personalised Registrations online or at auction. Search online to see what personalised registrations are available and how much they cost before buying.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
more_information:
Personalised registration numbers can only be used on a vehicle registered (or about to be registered), taxed and used in Great Britain.

%You only buy the right to have a particular registration number assigned to and displayed on a vehicle registered in your name, or in the name of someone else, known as the **nominee**.%

You can extend the right for a further 1, 2 or 3 years. This costs:

* £25 for 1 year
* £50 for 2 years
* £75 for 3 years

##What you’ll get

You’ll get a certificate of entitlement (V750), which includes details of:

* the registration number 
* the purchaser and nominee
* the date when the right to assign the registration number will end

The nominee has no right to the registration number until it's assigned to their vehicle. You can add a nominee (if you don’t have one) or change the nominee at any time, or at the same time as the registration number is assigned.
overview: Buy a personalised registration from DVLA Personalised Registrations online or at auction
title: Buy a personalised registration number
